snippet.title: Mother Direct 2022 Trailer
snippet.description:
The original Mother returns but in a fresh and shiny new coat of paint that would make anyone swoon. A complete, fan-made, re-imagining that gives the old NES Classic a lot more pizzazz. MOTHER: Encore strives to shine a new light onto the game that started it all!

Twitter: https://twitter.com/Mother_Encore?s=20

Discord Server: https://discord.gg/Awxx6tjXY7
